text: Sokode kare-ra wa, kare (no hikitori) ni nozomi ga nai koto o shiri, mitsu ni kyogi shita. Kare-ra no naka no nencho no mono ga itta. `Anata gata wa, chichi ga arra (no gyomei) ni yotte chikai o tate, mata izen yusufu no koto ni tsuite mo, do no yona ayamari o okashita ka o kangaenai no ka. Sorede chichi ga watashi o yurusu ka, mata arra ga watashi-tachi o o sabaki kudasaru made, watashi wa kesshite kono ji o hanarenaidearou. Kare wa mottomo sugureta saiketsu-sha de ara reru
